Nodes

From Tox Wiki
Jump to: navigation, search

In order to facilitate quick connections with other people using Tox, and to make life easier, Tox employs bootstrap nodes that each client connects to in order to retrieve a list of current clients connected to the pool. Below are a list of active nodes that you can use to connect to. For security reasons, this article is locked and only administrators can edit the list. If you have a node you want to add, please contact an admin. Want to help out by running a node? Checkout out Running a node.

IPv4 IPv6 port client id maintainer location STATUS
